ygData.subject: Re: Is there any demand for this type of site?
ygData.msgSnippet: Also you can Duel w/ a friend and just say OK I am gonna try this spell tell me how much dmg it does.  and you can do that anywhere . . . ... From: Mark
ygData.messageBody:
Also you can "Duel" w/ a friend and just say OK I am gonna try this spell
tell me how much dmg it does. and you can do that anywhere . . .


----- Original Message -----
From: Mark Muller <markm@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 12:26 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Is there any demand for this type of site?


> From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
> I'd be more than happy to help you out with info. Perhaps the most
accurate
> way to find out how much damage spell x does is to try it on the PVP
> server...that way you can have a friend that you cast on relay exact
numbers
> back. Of course this requires an active PVP necro, do we have any of
those
> on the list? Also, I believe the damage is not static, it depends on the
> level of the mob/player you cast on and their resistance levels to said
> magic.
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Murphy, Kenneth E. <MurphyK@...>
> To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 11:15 AM
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Is there any demand for this type of site?
>
>
> > From: "Murphy, Kenneth E." <MurphyK@...>
> >
> > Hello All
> >
> > I am currently running both a magician and a necromancer. I personally
am
> > the type of person that would rather know where to go and how-to do
things
> > rather then taking months to figure it all out myself. This is mostly
> > because I'm busy in my RL with work, marriage etc, etc ... Thus, for me,
> > just keeping up in levels near my friends is hard enough, much less
> running
> > around everywhere trying to find everything myself.
> >
> > There are a few things I find lacking in the main stream web sites info.
> >
> > A. The spell lists are out dated and don't provide the info I want. IE
> they
> > don't say this spell does this damage for this manna, here is the ratio.
> It
> > takes this many secs to cast with the channeling skill maxed for the
level
> > you first receive the spell. The necro DOT does X damage a tick for X
> ticks.
> > I would find that kind of extra statistics helpful.
> >
> > B. Where do you buy the darn spell? No site I have found is attempting
to
> > keep a list of vendor locations and their inventory and pricing for some
> > base charisma.
> >
> > C. The above info should be integrated to include if each spell is
> research
> > only or not. The status of research for that spell. IE broken or not.
And
> if
> > not broken what are the components to make the spell, what book and what
> > lang etc.
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What was YOUR favorite part?!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Tell other Star Wars fans at ONElist!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
>
